title: The Apple Vision Pro means Samsung's own XR headset has been delayed
description: The extended reality headset in the works at Samsung has been delayed, though a 2024 launch is still expected.

title: Hoping for a MacBook Pro with OLED? You might need to be really patient
description: A new report claims the first MacBook with OLED won’t turn up until 2027 (yes, you read that right).

title: SSD prices set to plummet, so now could be a great time to upgrade
description: SSDs are becoming more and more a better value proposition over HDDs, which could be a boon for small businesses looking to get started storing data.

title: The latest iPhone 15 Pro rumor reveals another unique color is on the way
description: Would a new color tempt more people to invest in a Pro-level iPhone? We might be about to find out.

title: Watch out - those Taylor Swift Eras tickets could be a scam
description: With millions expected to be battling it out online to secure tickets to the Taylor Swift Eras tour, fans are being warned of scams.

title: Wordle 749 frustrates players with 'annoying' answer. 'Hate words like this'

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, July 8 (game #530)

title: CASETiFY reveals Neon Genesis Evangelion collab for iPhones and AirPods
